name: Umbral Infusion, Mass
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of Shadows © 2016, Paizo Inc.
target: one mindless undead creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as umbral infusion, except it can affect multiple mindless undead creatures.
target_zh: 每施法者等级一个无心智不死生物，两两之间距离不能超过30呎
text_zh: 这个法术运作如同暗影灌注，除了它能影响复数的无心智不死生物。
